description: This file is the main entry point of a Flutter application that initializes and runs the 'Ocean Calendar' app. It sets up state management with Provider, defines the app's theme, and configures route handling for different screens like home and event form.

classes.name: CalendarApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that serves as the root of the Flutter application, setting up theme, routes, and state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that initializes and runs the Flutter application.
